Public NotInheritable Class ComVisibleAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class ComVisibleAttribute sealed : Attribute

Attribute.AttributeName: System.AttributeUsage(System.AttributeTargets.Assembly | System.AttributeTargets.Class | System.AttributeTargets.Struct | System.AttributeTargets.Enum | System.AttributeTargets.Method | System.AttributeTargets.Property | System.AttributeTargets.Field | System.AttributeTargets.Interface | System.AttributeTargets.Delegate, Inherited=false)

summary.span: 控制程序集中单独托管类型或成员，或所有类型对 COM 的访问性。

span.span: Controls accessibility of an individual managed type or member, or of all types within an assembly, to COM.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以将此特性应用于程序集、 接口、 类、 结构、 委托、 枚举、 字段、 方法或属性。You can apply this attribute to assemblies, interfaces, classes, structures, delegates, enumerations, fields, methods, or properties. 默认值是`true`，指示托管的类型是对 COM 可见。The default is `true`, which indicates that the managed type is visible to COM. 使公共托管程序集和类型可见，则不需要此属性它们是默认情况下对 COM 可见。This attribute is not needed to make public managed assemblies and types visible; they are visible to COM by default. 仅`public`类型可使可见。Only `public` types can be made visible. 特性不能用于使其他`internal`或`protected`类型对 COM 或若要使不可见类型的成员可见可见。The attribute cannot be used to make an otherwise `internal` or `protected` type visible to COM or to make members of a nonvisible type visible. 将属性设置为`false`程序集上隐藏所有`public`集中的类型。Setting the attribute to `false` on the assembly hides all `public` types within the assembly. 你可以有选择地使类型程序集内的可见通过将各个类型设置为`true`。You can selectively make types within the assembly visible by setting the individual types to `true`. 将属性设置为`false`特定类型上隐藏该类型及其成员。Setting the attribute to `false` on a specific type hides that type and its members. 但是，不能进行类型的成员可见类型是否为不可见。However, you cannot make members of a type visible if the type is invisible. 将属性设置为`false`上一种类型可防止该类型导出到类型库; 类没有注册接口永远不会是对非托管的响应性`QueryInterface`调用。Setting the attribute to `false` on a type prevents that type from being exported to a type library; classes are not registered; interfaces are never responsive to unmanaged `QueryInterface` calls. 除非你显式设置类和其成员`false`、 继承类可以向 COM 公开基类成员，原始类中不可见。Unless you explicitly set a class and its members to `false`, inherited classes can expose to COM base class members that are invisible in the original class. 例如，如果 classa 设置设置为`false`和到其成员不应用该特性、 类和其成员都是不可见给 com。For example, if you set ClassA to `false` and do not apply the attribute to its members, the class and its members are invisible to COM. 但是，如果你从为 ClassA 派生 ClassB，并将 ClassB 导出到 COM，为 ClassA 成员变得的 ClassB 可见基类成员。However, if you derive ClassB from ClassA and export ClassB to COM, ClassA members become visible base class members of ClassB. 导出过程的详细说明，请参阅[程序集到类型库转换摘要](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3a37eefb-a76c-4000-9080-7dbbf66a4896)。For a detailed description of the export process, see [Assembly to Type Library Conversion Summary](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3a37eefb-a76c-4000-9080-7dbbf66a4896). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何控制对类的 COM 可见性，以便其成员不可见。The following example shows how you can control the visibility to COM of a class so that its members are invisible. 通过设置`ComVisibleAttribute`到`false`上`MyClass`(`SampleClass`在 Visual Basic 示例)，和`false`上`MyMethod`和`MyProperty`，你可以避免无意中公开给 COM 通过继承的成员。By setting `ComVisibleAttribute` to `false` on `MyClass`(`SampleClass` in the Visual Basic example), and `false` on `MyMethod` and `MyProperty`, you can avoid inadvertently exposing the members to COM through inheritance. [!code-cpp[Classic ComVisibleAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic ComVisibleAttribute Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ComVisibleAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic ComVisibleAttribute Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ComVisibleAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic ComVisibleAttribute Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 要使类型对 COM 可见，请将该属性设置为`true`。To make types visible to COM, set the attribute to `true`. 若要隐藏从 COM 类型，请将属性设置为`false`。To hide types from COM, set the attribute to `false`.

public: property bool Value { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示 COM 类型是否可见。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the COM type is visible.
